Title: ARDConnect
Description: A prototype program to interface a Construct game with Arduino boards using the Firmata protocol.

Title: BareDev
Description: An open-source, QMK-compatible, ABNT2-based 70% keyboard, focusing in a smaller footprint while retaining all the functions found on a TKL (Del and arrow keys doubling as the navigational cluster).
Made to fill the gap between a 60%, including the function row, using less horizontal space than a 75%.
